result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Review hearing on October 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 12:59 pm. 

Deft appears via video, in custody, pro se.  
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Court notes counsel has not yet been appointed. Deft. is comfortable proceeding today but requests German Interpreter for all hearings that follow review hearings. 
COURT finds good cause to extend time limits for preliminary hearing. 
Prelim set for 10/17/2022 to be removed from calendar. 
Review set for 10/19/2022 at 1:00 pm in Courtroom B. 

Adj: 1:05 pm.

Review hearing on October 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary Hearing on October 17, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:39 p.m. 

State appears by ADA Alex Lech.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Heather Roehr, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved.

Deft on PO hold.

COURT ORDERS: $500.00 cash bond. 

CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 3 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
RH: 10/12/22 @ 1:00 p.m. Courtroom B.
PH: 10/17/22 @ 9:00 a.m. Courtroom B. 


Adjourned: 2:44 p.m.
